member_organisations:
Member list: http://worldbioenergy.org/our-members 
 
Individual members are not listed on the homepage. They are instead available in the annual report. Only Full Members represented by Associations and Associated Members represented by Companies are included in the list. In total, the membership currently exceeds 240. companies, associations and individuals.
fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Food Safety, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
Energy Union for Europe 
EU's Common Agricultural Policy  
Tackling Climate Change in European Union 
The Clean Air Package 
Sustainability  
Renewable Energy Directive  
EU Transport Policy
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication:
Data: Publication of Global Bioenergy Statistics providing the latest updated data on the development of all bioenergy sectors globally and within the European Union.  
 
Facts: Concise natural science based factsheets on various bioenergy technologies and processes  
 
Mission Reports: Latest market information on international regions focussing on bioenergy and based on events/mission trips organised by WBA 
 
Webinars: Web based seminars on bioenergy sectors  
 
Newsletters: Member exclusive information on the latest bioenergy developments including member information, statistics, policies, events and markets.
goals__remit:
Promote the sustainable utilisation of biomass globally and to support the business environment for bioenergy.  
 
WBA woks with companies, associations, individuals in the activities of: knowledge transfer by publication of factsheets, statistics reports, mission reports, newsletters etc.; technology transfer via our online equipment directory platform; and capacity building by assisting in the setting up of national associations or branch offices all over the world.  
 
WBA is a member driven organisation with more than 240 members representing 60 countries. We assist our members in identifying new markets, improving networking opportunities, provide ready access to latest news about bioenergy.
